StringListProperty.Name: ExecutablePath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for executable files while building a VC++ project. Corresponds to environment variable PATH.

StringListProperty.Name: IncludePath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for include files while building a VC++ project. Corresponds to environment variable INCLUDE.

StringListProperty.Name: LibraryPath
StringListProperty.Description: Path to use when searching for library files while building a VC++ project. Corresponds to environment variable LIB.
